thread.title: Assault rifles blessed in tiny U.S. church

title: Assault rifles blessed in tiny U.S. church
text:
Assault rifles blessed in tiny U.S. church Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 00:53 
Hundreds of couples toting AR-15 rifles packed a Unification church in Pennsylvania on Wednesday to have their marriages blessed and their weapons celebrated as ''rods of iron.'' ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Hundreds of couples toting AR-15 rifles packed a Unification church in Pennsylvania on Wednesday to have their marriages blessed and their weapons celebrated as "rods of iron."
